Roles and responsibilities:


Ascertaining proper & adequate safety in shop floor among team members.

Employing Kaizen in Quality department by making simple but effective gauges for
checking parts

Coordinating with Jig Maintenance and Production Control Department to achieve 
the periodic production targets.
